attributes.action: theory test expiry running out due to COVID-19 learning disabilities people
attributes.additional_details: People with learning disability struggle every day to pass their theory test some past in end of 2019 and now face the fact that they have to do it again this is causing them to be anxious and very disappointed in their selves it’s not their fault they have not been able to do the driving test now they You give priority to the front line staff to do that test but nothing for the vulnerable that need their driving test and are struggling to cope with doing their theory again please consider the next actions to support everyone not just people with Learning difficulties
attributes.background: Extend theory tests or free theory test for people Especially the People who struggle to pass the last one because of learning disabilities
